name: UpdatePropertyValue
description:
Update specific fields of a CRM property partially.

Use this tool to partially update specific fields of a CRM property identified by its name. Only the specified fields will be overwritten.

parameters.name: crm_object_type
parameters.description: Specify the type of CRM object (e.g., 'contacts', 'deals') to update.

parameters.name: property_identifier
parameters.description: The unique name of the CRM property to be updated.

parameters.name: property_update_details
parameters.description: A JSON object containing fields to update a CRM property, such as group name, visibility, options, display order, description, calculation formula, label, type, field type, and form field status.

groupName.description: The name of the property group the property belongs to.

hidden.description: If true, the property won't be visible and can't be used in HubSpot.
If true, the option will not be shown in forms, bots, or meeting scheduling pages. Supported for contact, company, ticket, and custom object enumeration properties.

displayOrder.description: Options are shown in order starting with the lowest positive integer value. Values of -1 will cause the option to be displayed after any positive values.

label.description: A human-readable option label that will be shown in HubSpot.

value.description: The internal value of the option, which must be used when setting the property value through the API.

options.description: A list of valid options for the property.

description.description: A description of the property that will be shown as help text in HubSpot.

calculationFormula.description: Represents a formula that is used to compute a calculated property.

type.description: The data type of the property.

fieldType.description: Controls how the property appears in HubSpot.

formField.description: Whether or not the property can be used in a HubSpot form.
